definition: Ejin Banner in Alxa League 阿拉善盟[A1 la1 shan4 Meng2], Inner Mongolia (formerly in Gansu 1969-1979)
forehead/horizontal tablet or inscribed board/specified number or amount
only used in 濟濟|济济[ji3 ji3]
to cross a river/to aid or relieve/to be of help
used in place names associated with the Ji River 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3]/surname Ji
to receive/to accept/to enjoy/to bring into/to pay (tax etc)/nano- (one billionth)/to reinforce sole of shoes or stockings by close sewing
banner/flag/(in Qing times) Manchu (cf. 八旗[Ba1 qi2])/administrative subdivision in inner Mongolia equivalent to 縣|县[xian4] county/CL:面[mian4]

sentences.english: The Laodonggou gold deposit in the Erjinaqi, Inner Mongolia is an oxidizing-Leaching type gold deposit.
sentences.chinese: 內蒙古額濟納旗老硐溝礦牀爲氧化淋濾型金礦牀。

sentences.english: After a more than 450 kilometers' trip, we arrived at Ejin Banner in the early evening.
sentences.chinese: 經450多公里的旅程，於當天傍晚到達額濟納旗。
